headline: Ask HN: Shift+Click Broken For Anyone Else?
description:
Does anyone else use Shift+Click? [0] If so, has it been working for you recently?

For about the pst week, all I get is one of those irritating "Oops, something went wrong!.." error messages, when I try and view an image. The site itself is still up and running. Their Twitter account is full of tumbleweed, so no news there.

[0] https://shft.cl/
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Shift+点击对其他任何人来说都是坏的吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Shift+點擊對其他任何人來說都是壞的嗎？
